org.apache.taverna.server.master.worker

Interface WorkerModel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PolicyLimits
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalWorkerState

    public interface WorkerModel
extends PolicyLimits
    Profile of the getters and setters in a worker system. Ensures that the persisted state matches the public view on the state model at least fairly closely.
    Author:
    Donal Fellows
